00020 // Helper function to be able to item_cast this type of items.
00021 inline GroupItem* item_cast_helper(Item* i, const GroupItem*)
00022 {
00023    return Item::groupItem(i);
00024 }

00124 inline uint32 
00125 GroupItem::getItemNumber(uint32 offset) const 
00126 {
00127    if (offset < getNbrItemsInGroup()) {
00128       return m_itemsInGroup[offset];
00129    }
00130    return MAX_UINT32;
00131 }
00132 
00133 inline uint32

00135 {
00136    return m_nbrItemsInGroup;
00137 }
00138

00141    return m_itemsInGroup;
